captions.text:
I don't know. My right ankle, everybody
kinda laughs and they joke,

but it's still completely crap
at the moment.

So, it works good for driving cars
but, we'll see today
if it works still for riding motorcycles.

This is where I'm going.
[My Team]

[Travis] Really, it's been
a year and a half

since I've been on a motorcycle, and
I'm going to go have some fun today.

All the D.C. guys out here, Maddo, Jeremy
McGrath, Adam Cianciarulo, Nate Adams,

the D.C. guys filming--they're
actually filming right now--

alot of the guys that just have
a lot of fun on their bikes

at a place called, "The Thing" Ranch
with Jeremy McGrath who is the king.

[Robbie Maddison] There's an amazing
jump mark over behind the lake here.

Travis Pastrana obviously
needs little introduction.

Having him here at M.C.'s
ranch is kind of magical,

He's dealing with a few things, which
is probably a rider's nightmare.
But he's an amazing talent, I'm sure

he's still going to look like there's
nothing wrong with him.

Sorry about blowing out your burn out,
Adam. Thanks for setting it all up.
It was beautiful, man, just pristine.
You've got some tips going on in there.
Yeah. I got a bunch of greys, actually,

I've even got to the point where I'm like
a silver fox who needs a change.

I haven't reached that status yet,
but I feel it coming.
There's good dirt, but then rocks come up

and you'll hit one and swap
your front end a little bit.

What we're all really here
is not the shooting,

it's not the motorcycle-riding,
it's the frog-hop.

The current frop hop possibly world
champion is Robbie Maddison.
So, he's the one we want to beat.

[Travis ] But I thought it was
more of a kangaroo hop,
because you're from the land down under.

The main technique is not on the outside,
it goes on the inside so it's like--

[Travis] Oh! So you actually get
a little pull off of that.

[Travis] It's not one single jump back
here, it's the same distance.

Most fun and most technically challenging,
scariest places to ride.

[Travis] This is it. We are done. Jeremy
Mcgrath's ranch D.C. photoshoot.

I have blisters all over everywhere.
I can't sit, I can't walk, I can't move.
and I just got a perma-grin. It's awesome!

We're in the true man cave, man heaven.
This is the king's house. Jeremy McGrath,

we're shooting guns. It's about 10:30 PM.
Been riding dirt bikes.

I don't know anything about shooting.
We're going see a big buck hunter
help us for our real guns.
That's how we do at the range right here.

[Ronnie] You can feel the pressure
wave hit your face.
It's something I've never felt before.
When they shoot, it hits you

See, that hit me. Two hits
in the face right now.

I got the last one, and
there's no more left.

Mr Cianciarulo has absolutely gone off
his brains, and to keep the party calm,

I'm going to get some more, and
this is our means of transport so,
[sucks gums] someone's got to do it.

[Travis] It's time to head to Maryland,
hit some pit bikes,
and have some fun with some friends.

[Lyn-Z] ]So Travis just got finished
telling me how awesome
the new pit bike/ vet track is,

the one that basically Hubert
built for me to ride.

And I'm sitting here, making
thank you cards.

I've already gotten a few gifts and we
don't even know what kind of baby

I mean, all the toys are here, and
everyone's here and they're out
playing, and I can't really play anymore.

[Travis] On the next episode of
On Pace with Pastrana,

the fun continues in Maryland with Steve
McCann and the Florida Georgia line

title: On Pace w/ Pastrana - FMX, Guns, & Frog Hopping - S02E04

comments.text:
For a sport to be a sport it requires physical and mental requirements. 
Mentally when your racing you have to pick the best lines and the quickest 
way to get off the starting gate. You wont understand the physical state of 
it unless you do it going as fast as you can on a huge track for 30 mins + 
2 laps with no brakes. It requires a huge amount of endurance. Anf the guy 
you think suck is a legend. He won a sx champion ship and went to motocross 
of nations and is a amazing fmx rider.
